title: ARAM changes have ruined it for me
body:
I am a dirty casual. I only play ARAM but im not enjoying it since the changes. I dont claim to know why, its just much less fun.

Its like there is very little room for counter play once a team gets ahead. 

Champs mean more than ever. I used to love beating good ARAM team comp using skill on underrated champs. Doesnt seem possible anymore.

Were people actually complaining about long games? They werent that common for me but when I did have one, they were extreemly intense and challening games. Not sure why thats a bad thing.

replies.body: People take ARAM seriously? News to me. I thought it was just a casual game/time waster for shits and gigs.
Wouldnt say i take it seriously, its just the only mode i play at the moment.
